# Chandan Kumar Thakur (The WH2)

Nepal-based AI architect, web developer, and cybersecurity student at Herald College Kathmandu (University of Wolverhampton).

## About
Chandan Kumar Thakur, known as The WH2, develops real-world systems like AI-driven traffic solutions, custom AI platforms such as TalkGPT, and multiple web applications aimed at solving practical problems. He is an ISO certified Frontend Web Developer, a BSc (Hons) Cybersecurity student, and currently works in Research & Development (R&D) at NavaNexa Pvt. Ltd. (Kupondole, Kathmandu) on the N-Traffic Jam project. With a strong White Hat mindset, he prioritizes security, deployment, and impactâ€”turning ideas into live, scalable platforms that serve both innovation and national growth.



## Core Projects
- **Portfolio:** https://thewh2.netlify.app/
- **SMM Store:** https://wh2store.netlify.app/
- **TalkGPT:** AI platform for conversational excellence.

## Education
- **BSc (Hons) Cybersecurity:** Herald College Kathmandu (2025 - Present)
- **Higher Secondary:** Golden Gate Int'l College (2023 - 2025)
- **Secondary School:** Greenland H.S.E.B. School (SEE 2023)

## Skills
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Python, ReactJS, NodeJS, Docker, Git, Firebase, Supabase, PostgreSQL, MQTT, Canva.
